Class IShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • init.SysData

  • public class IShape
extends java.lang.Object
    This IFly object represents the class system
    Author:
    Java Course Team 2014, University Of Haifa-Israel

      This method add a new Lesson to IShape Hint- think of all the things that are related to a lesson or should store the lesson, and don't forget to rollBack if needed

                           java.lang.String firstName,

        firstName -
        lastName -
        birthDate -
        password -
        email -
        customerAddress -
        Returns:
        true if the customer was added successfully

                         int maxStudent,
                         int branchNum,

        lessonName -
        dateTime -
        level -
        coachNum -
        maxStudent -
        branchNum -

        Returns:

      • addCustomerToLesson

        public boolean addCustomerToLesson(java.lang.String custNum,
                                   int lessonNum)
        This method adds a customer to a specific lesson if his subscription fits, he has no other lessons at the time, and there is a free space in the class Hint: if needed, don't forget to rollback
        Parameters:
        custNum -
        lessonNum -
        Returns:
        true if the customer is registered to the lesson, false other

      • cancelSubscription

        public boolean cancelSubscription(int subNumber)
        This method cancels a subscription from the system using the subNumber (Primary Key). The subscription will be canceled IFF all related objects will delete from IShape
        Parameters:
        subNumber -
        Returns:
        true if subscription was canceled, false otherwise

      • getAllLessonsOfMostActiveCustomer

        public java.util.List<core.RoomRun> getAllLessonsOfMostActiveCustomer()
        This method returns all lessons of the most active customer. Most active customer is the customer with the most ATTENDED lessons A lesson will be counted as attended if its date has past already
        Returns:

      • getAllCustomersFromBranchXbutNotFromBranchY

        public java.util.List<core.Customer> getAllCustomersFromBranchXbutNotFromBranchY(int branchXnumber,
                                                                                 int branchYnumber)
        Find customers that practiced in a given branch X but not in another given branch Y Hint: locate all the customers from X and remove from it all customers from branches X and Y.
        Parameters:
        branchXnumber -
        branchYnumber -
        Returns:
        list of customers

      • getTheMostPopularLessonType

        public utils.E_Lessons getTheMostPopularLessonType()
        This query returns the most popular Lesson Type. Most popular Lesson Type is the Lesson Types with the highest number of registered customers. Hint!The number of registered customers is saved for each lesson
        Returns:
        a lesson type

      • getReceptionistOfTheMonth

        public core.Receptionist getReceptionistOfTheMonth()
        The receptionist of the month is the receptionist who sold the most active subscriptions this month (must be at least 2) A subscription will be count as an active subscription only after it was used for registering a lesson
        Returns:
        the receptionist of the month if it exist, null other

      • getAllSuperSeniorCoaches

        public core.Coach[] getAllSuperSeniorCoaches()
        This method finde all of the super senior coaches of this month. A coach is considered a super senior coach if he started working over 15 years ago and gives at least 2 lessons this month
        Returns:
        an array of super senior coaches if found, null other

      • getTopJanuaryReceptionists

        public core.Receptionist getTopJanuaryReceptionists()
